title: I can't post on the boards
body:
I get "eror 404" every time I try to post...

EDIT: The boards are really screwing up. This morning, I tried to post several times and got error messages. Apparently the posts did come up... Several minutes later. What a pain.

replies.body: Happening for me as well. Sometimes I can comment on posts as well, but most of the time it doesn't let me. I click "post," but nothing happens. I got a warning for spam of a posting that I had received error messages for and supposedly not been able to post, but apparently it had been posted multiple times. Maybe this is the case for you. Maybe it's posting, but you can't necessarily *see* it.

I had the same problem, although it only affected me on certain Boards. Don't have a workaround for you sadly, but I can say it is not a permanent thing. I also know it's a known issue. Hang in there!
